rss.channel:
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo (0.2-dev) Changeshttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlApache Forrest ProjectInfo ( 0.2-dev ) Changes en-us
See also the main changes related to all plugins.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code update (bug FOR-977) http://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode update by RDG (fixes bug FOR-977)
:
Fix URLs to issues in the release notes generation.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code updatehttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode update by TS : Adding svn support specific properties to the default.plugin.properties.xml. Further activated this new properties (projectInfo.svn.ext and projectInfo.svn.path-prefix) in the svn-log.xsl. This allows to have a more flexible export string.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by TS : Add support for svn log files. This let you extract changes based on a svn log file. Further this provides some handy ways to find out the first and last commit of a month and the generation of svn cli commands.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by DC :
Enable optional release/introduction elements.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Allow an aggregation of all use cases in a project.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Start off a use case document for the changelog features of the plugin.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by DC :
Add section to output "Introduction and explanation of symbols". Show the unique symbols.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code updatehttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode update by DC :
List all contributors for each release by showing a list of committers and a list of other contributors.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code fixhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode fix by TS : Fixing small issue with the last ',' which should not be displayed on the last entry of the contributors list.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code fix (bug FOR-839) http://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode fix by RDG (fixes bug FOR-839)
:
Using a unique key including the release version.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code updatehttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode update by DC :
Make the list of contributors for each release be a compact list.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code updatehttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode update by DC :
Changed rendered text for @dev attribute from "(@dev)" to the more explicit "Committed by @dev.".
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code updatehttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode update by DC :
Changed rendered text for @fix-for from "Fixes" to the more general "See Issue".
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add support for Use Case documentation. This can be used to generate various different types of user an developer documentation, such as step by step user instructions, or developer implementation notes. See http://localhost:8888/docs/developer/useCases.html for more information.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Use locationmap for resolution of resources and files. Resources are exposed via {lm:projectInfo.*}
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code update (bug for-514) http://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode update by jjp (fixes bug for-514)
:
do not limit status.xml contexts in projectinfo plugin. Thanks to cyriaque dupoirieux.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Added RSS changes feeds for individual versions.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Removed todo items from changes RSS feed.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add configuration options to control sorting of changes and inclusion of developer and committer lists.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add list of committers and developers to changes document.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by DC :
Enable project-level locationmap to define the location of the project:status file which contains the change notes. Therefore this can even be from a remote location.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add an automated index page that lists all projects in a category. Use projectDetails/category/*.xml to retrieve it.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add an automated project index page that lists all projects grouped by Category. Use projectDetails/category-index.xml to retrieve it.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add an automated index page that lists all projects using a specific language. Use projectDetails/*-lang.xml to retrieve it.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add an automated project index page that lists all projects grouped by language. Use projectDetails/lang-index.xml to retrieve it.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add an automated index page for all projects using a specified programming language. Use projectDetails/*-lang.xml to retrieve it.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add an automated site.xml snippet that provides links to an index page for all languages in use in all projects. XInclude projectDetails/lang_index.siteSnippet.xml in your site.xml file.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add an indexing capability for all known project descriptors.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Use locationmap to expose plugin resources.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add projectDetails page using the DOAP.xml descriptor.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Add projectDetails page using the DOAP.xml descriptor.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code fix (bug FOR-564) http://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode fix by DC (fixes bug FOR-564)
:
Use the value "current" for the releaseNotes_* URI or specify a version number, i.e. show what is new for the latest release. Thanks to Cyriaque Dupoirieux.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo docs addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmldocs add by RDG :
Basic documentation on how to create release notes are now included on the plugins documentation index page.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Added automatic generation of release notes by requesting **/releaseNotes_VERSION-NUMBER.xml
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo design addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmldesign add by RDG :
Added optional "notes" element to "release" element of status 1.3 DTD. This will be inserted into the release notes for that version.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode add by RDG :
Enable the generation of changes for a specific version by requesting **/changes_VERSION-NUMBER.xml
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo docs fixhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmldocs fix by DC :
Use relative location of images directory.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo design addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmldesign add by DC :
Added better sitemap match using regexp to deal with sub-directories too.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code fixhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode fix by DC :
Replace use of document() function in changes2rss.xml with sitemap aggregation.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code fix (bug FOR-455) http://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode fix by DC (fixes bug FOR-455)
:
Use the "title" attribute of "changes" and "todo" tags if it exists, otherwise use the hard-coded values. Thanks to Cyriaque Dupoirieux.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code updatehttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode update by RDG :
Move ToDo and Changes pipelines to this plugin, from core.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo admin addhttp://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmladmin add by RDG :
Initial plugin code.
Apache Forrest ProjectInfo code update (bug FOR-977) http://forrest.apache.org/pluginDocs/plugins_0_90/index.html/changes.htmlcode update by RDG (fixes bug FOR-977)
:
Fix URLs to issues in the release notes generation.
